summary: Implements a PyTorch-friendly dataset that transforms Lhotse CutSet metadata into mini-batches containing audio features and BPE-tokenized text, performing tokenization, file I/O, optional augmentation, and feature extraction while delegating sampling and de‑duplication to Lhotse samplers.
business_intent: Facilitate scalable training and evaluation of speech‑to‑text models that use byte‑pair‑encoding tokenization within the Lhotse data ecosystem.
